DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To evaluate correlation audiometric threshold , pitch matching ( PM ) , minimum masking level ( MML ) , Tinnitus Handicap Inventory ( THI ) Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) tinnitus patient . Subjects : 48 patient tinnitus main complaint OTOSUL , Otorrinolaringologia Sul-Fluminense , Volta Redonda , RJ , Brasil Centro de Tratamento e Pesquisa em Zumbido , Belo Horizonte , MG , Brasil . Method : Subjects perform tonal audiometry , Pitch Matching ( PM ) Minimum Masking Level ( MML ) tinnitus . They also fulfil Tinnitus Handicap Inventory ( THI ) Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) . Data statistically compare correlation audiometric threshold , psycho-acoustic measure questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: Correlation Analysis Hearing Thresholds , Validated Questionnaires Psychoacoustic Measurements Tinnitus Patients
